entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 7:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C

Humidity: 95 %

Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this morning and ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
